title: A new genre of Horror
review: A new taste of Horror , true psychological Horror , very disturbing in a good way , the soundtrack is hauntingly beautiful , must watch it .

title: A whole new level of the apocalyptic movies
review:
This movie is brilliant and very entertaining , John Krasinski done a great job directing and acting in this movie , despite a very little dialogues in the movie But the looks between the characters and face expression was more than enough to live the situation with the character . Also Emily Blunt's acting was sooo great , Noah Jupe was amazing and i think he has a great bright future in acting and Millicent Simmonds's acting (the deaf actress) was exceptional . 
I'm very excited to see a sequal .

movie_title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
title: What a wonderful movie
review:
This movie is sooo well done , the movie is sweet and very enjoyable . The location is amazing , i love the 1940s era , and WW2 stories . 
Lily james as always did an amzing act , well done .
